posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I am looking to sell a Piedmont Factory 42 Kleinow Boston Catching.  Color is great and the card has nice picture clarity.  No writing or paper gone.  Creasing and does appear to have a tiny tear at the start on the larger crese.

Price is $135, delivered.  SOLDDD

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
